column1: #Text=Did your dog just have puppies and you need to sell them ?
#Text=Well do n't worry or be sad you 'll know how to sell your dog in no time !
#Text=So you want to sell a puppy at the proper age .
#Text=Once the pup is at the proper age you want to sell it .
#Text=You should start making attractive ads up for the pup such as " Young Stout female bird hound for sale ! " Or " Daughter of a champion pup for sale
